title: regulations with respect to which, pursuant to section 4(8) of that Act, a draft has
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health and Social Care
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health and Social Care 
Professionals Act 2005 (Section 4(7)) (Membership of Council) Regulations
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited health social care professional act 2005 (section 4(7)) (membership council) regulation

title: regulations with respect to which, pursuant to section 4(8) of that Act, a draft has
regulations with respect to which, pursuant to section 4(8) of that Act, a draft has
heading: 2. For the purposes of appointments to the Council under section 9 of the
text_raw:
2. For the purposes of appointments to the Council under section 9 of the 

Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005 (No. 27 of 2005) - 

(a) 

(b) 

the total number of persons to be appointed under section 9(3)(b) 
shall be varied to 13, and 

the number of them to be appointed to represent the interest of the 
general public under section 9(3)(b)(iv) shall be varied to 10. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

4 November, 2020. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 10th November, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [506] 3

title: regulations with respect to which, pursuant to section 4(8) of that Act, a draft has
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

The purpose of these regulations is to increase from 8 to 10 the number of 
persons to be representative of the interests of the general public that are to be 
appointed by the Minister for Health to the Health and Social Care Professionals 
Council. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [506]
